\SetAPI{J-C}
\section{cache.lru.threshold}
\label{configuration:CacheLruThreshold}
\ClearAPI
Sets the threshold of the Least Recently Used entries. If activated the RootCache contains references to the last n entities in the a list so they are not garbage collected. Valid values are numbers $\geq$ 0, whereas 0 stands for deactivated.
%% GENERATED USAGE REFERENCE - DO NOT EDIT

		\prettyref{module:Cache} \\
	\hline
\end{longtable}
%% GENERATED USAGE REFERENCE END
\type{com.koch.ambeth.cache.config.CacheConfigurationConstants.CacheLruThreshold}
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{cache.lru.threshold}}]
cache.lru.threshold=0
\end{lstlisting}
